Name: Yokai's Secret
About the game: Plot overview For thousands of years, the Yokai-girls in the 'Country of Yamato' lived in peace with human beings, but the Yokai-girls suddenly rioted, and the whole world lost its color. As the 'Master Hentai'before, you undertake the responsibility of saving the Yokai-girls and the world! Features Move the color blocks, complete the color arrangement puzzles, and reveal the truth of the riots! 14 Yokai-girls with different characters are looking forward to meeting you！❤ With live2D technology, all characters will move! Every Yokai-girls has multiple interactions! Each character has an exciting personality voice!❤
Meta Title: Yokai's Secret: Feb 6, 2020, Double W and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Yokai's Secret? Check out the release date (Feb 6, 2020), developer insights from Double W, and a complete game summary.
